title: Ep 152: Jobs, Passions and Self Esteem
description: 2018 is in full swing and I've been getting lots of emails about work and changing jobs. What's an actor to do who is turning 30 and is getting laid off from his day job? Another gentleman writes in asking how he can get the self esteem to pursue a job he wants. A girl is feeling lonely dating a guy who works nights. What can she do? Also, I've found a new BBC show to get excited about. Big day! Let's get our lives in this ep.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
